overview:
Valerio likes to build new products and to put them in the hands of delighted users. His new adventure is JogHop. JogHop builds exercise adventure for the iPhone. Players use natural movements like jogging in place, jumping and ducking to win the game.

During his career Valerio has developed several products. When at Mindflash he managed the design, implementation and marketing of CourseHost, one of the first Cloud-based e-learning systems. CourseHost has been used by over 10,000 trainers to create over 1M pages and quizzes for over 500,000 learners.

When at MetaHeuristics he developed Fuzzy and Neural Network solvers used for the optimization of industrial processes and worked with companies in the US and Europe.

Valerio loves to work with other people, to keep them energized, and to help them do the best work they can. He is an expert of large-scale web deployments, various programming languages, and cocos2d for the iPhone – his latest passion.
